participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is an outgoing and motivated individual who values fitness and family.
participant_1.background: i live in a three storey house. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i am married to a doctor.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is a laid-back and approachable person who enjoys sharing stories and food.
participant_2.background: i did not graduate high school. i live in canada. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.
